description: Rich ragu and filling butterbeans make this vegan meatball dish hearty and warming.
keywords: Vegan Meatballs with Butterbean & Tomato Sauce
name: Vegan Meatballs with Butterbean & Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the meatballs into the sauce along with the lemon zest and spinach and cook for 3 minutes, or until the spinach has wilted.
